audioText: Cette lettre a été laissée sur votre bureau ce matin.
question: What happened to the letter?
options: It was left on your desk this morning.
It was sent from your desk this morning.
It was written on your desk this morning.
It was read on your desk this morning.
explanation: The text states 'Cette lettre a été laissée sur votre bureau ce matin' - This letter was left on your desk this morning. The French sentence uses 'laissée' - the past participle feminine form of 'laisser' (to leave). The past participle agrees with the feminine noun 'lettre' in the passive voice construction.
